resources.string: "Accessing the phone via local network: • Press the \"Start server\" button in the application. • Point the web browser on computer to the address provided in settings interface or notification. It should look like http://<your_ip>:<port> • \"How do I connect\" button helps with the network setup based on your IP. • Enter your username/password, and select the desired method of viewing your camera. • If you cannot open the link, try to ping the phone's IP address, and if it fails, check the network configuration. Internet access via Ivideon: • Attach phone to Ivideon account using \"Cloud streaming\" settings. • Press the \"Start server\" button in the application. • Log in to your Ivideon account at http://ivideon.com/my or Ivideon app. "

"IP Webcam uses following software: libjpeg, © Independent JPEG Group, http://lij.org ffmpeg, © FFmpeg team, http://ffmpeg.org/ libvpx, © WebM project, http://www.webmproject.org/ libopus, © Xiph.org Foundation and others, http://opus-codec.org/ mongoose (MIT fork), © Sergey Lyubka, https://github.com/cesanta/mongoose
Special thanks to: Han Chengyu for Chinese translation Nenad Tomasic for German translation Paolo Stavolo for Italian translation Froozeify for French translation Rafał Płatek http://www.getpoland.com for Polish translation Francisco Rosúa for Spanish translation Sangyong, Byun for Korean translation Alexey Vasilyev for amazing viewer, tinyCam Monitor
Thanks to: Robb Larsen, Jason Tarnutzer for Droid X testing Marcus Pascall, Eugene Jennings, Peter Boeren, Scott B, Eric Batts, Alexei Vidmich for application testing. Berthold Möller for his help with pinpointing the nasty issue."
Record video to internal storage when sound detection is triggered
Your exact location will be accessible via web interface sensors page and recorded in photos (enable this in Video preferences)
Are you sure you want to remove this script? This will also remove all settings you saved for this script.
To turn the device into dedicated IP camera, check this option and disable Settings->Security->Screen lock
"Application will now run in background. You can quickly put the IP Webcam in background by pressing \"Home\" key."
Camera is used by another app: cannot initialize! Sorry!
Cannot open previously configured camera! Would you like to use the default one? This may result in previous settings being overwritten.
Cannot open port. Close programs using it or choose another one.
Splitting continuously recorded videos into $VAL minute chunks
Enter length (in minutes) of continuously recorded videos
In order to activate OpenH264, a codec binary must be downloaded to your device. Proceed with the download?
This email is already registered. If you own this account, please log in.
" By creating an account you agree to "Ivideon terms of service.
"It's free and takes but a minute"
What is Ivideon, privacy options, where to access your stream etc.
Password is not saved on your device
Log out the currently active account
Do you want to log out?
Cannot login: check your email and password
Login attempts are too frequent. Please try again in 30 seconds.
Failed to create a new user: $ERROR
Could not attach your phone to Ivideon account: $ERROR
Enable to watch the video via Ivideon website or application
Access your video stream from anywhere

Cloud streaming is not supported on your device, or IP Webcam was unable to find the necessary encoders. Android 4.1+ device is required for Ivideon support. To globally access your device try using port forwarding in Wi-Fi environment, make the device accessible via SSH or VPN server, or ask your mobile operator for a globally accessible IP address.
Do you want to optimize your streaming experience by setting video resolution to $NEWRES and bitrate to 1200 kbps?
Encoder test successful. Cloud streaming should work on your device. Log in to Ivideon to connect this phone to the cloud surveillance service.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Use Ivideon cloud service to access your camera from anywhere

"To use Ivideon streaming, please enable it in Settings->Cloud Streaming. It's supported by most Android 4.1+ devices.
Ivideon service allows the stream to be accessible globally, without additional setup. Streaming for up to 2 cameras is free, with paid options available for additional cameras and cloud storage."
" Watch this video stream using your Ivideon account, "$ACCOUNT" , by either using http://ivideon.com/my or Ivideon apps for Android, iPhone, Mac and PC "
When device is directly reachable via the network
Let display turn off when inactive
Drag controls onto this button to remove them from the interface.

"The server will be disguised now. It will open a fully functional browser window. \"Back\" button, will stop the server and open a home screen, like a regular browser. \"Home\" button puts it in background (disable notification in options if you don't want it to pop up)."
Do you want to watch tutorial video?
"Don't warn when unprotected server is publicly accessible"
Allow IP Webcam to run alongside other applications on the device
Enhance night vision, embed date/time in video
Get GPS fix for inclusion in photos on server start
Uses battery even when camera is not used
Enhance video shot in the dark
Enter a cheat (you can get a list at http://ip-webcam.appspot.com)
"Experimental! Use lower resolutions when it's on and report issues"
Export all saved settings and plugin configuration to IP Webcam Pro

"Now the display will fade to conserve battery. Note that you cannot turn off the screen with \"lock\" hardware button, because on most phones it puts processor into a sleep mode, ignoring the processor wake lock. Tap screen to show the UI again."
Failed to send report. Try again? The reason was:
" I condemn the practice of stealing the unique brand name, and see it as harming the user experience, and as an unfair competition."
" Help promote IP Webcam the fair way, by rating it on Google Play."
" IP Webcam was first released in 2009 and became the most popular application of its kind, counting more than 10 million downloads and featured on major tech news sources."
" In the light of increasing number of support requests for applications that are not IP Webcam, but are named as such, I decided to raise awareness of IP Webcam imitations."
" If you have another question, feel free to email me at "pas.anddev@gmail.com
Front camera hotswitch not available for this resolution
Flip the video. Rotate and flip to mirror it.
"The camera will focus one time now. Use \"Search\" hardware button to focus from the main window or the \"Autofocus\" button in webinterface control panel."
Check this if you experience issues with audio records or AAC stream
Hardware audio encoding is unavailable on this device
Check this if you experience issues with manual or motion-triggered video records
Hardware video encoding is unavailable on this device
Limit frames per second to this value. (Your camera supports maximum $VAL)

"The application uses maximum FPS available on your phone. The video encoding is a costly process and FPS be low when you have slower processor. Try lowering your resolution to improve fps in this case. Often phones have a slow outgoing network connection. Lowering video quality helps to improve FPS by reducing the size of transmitted data."
How do you want to connect?
"Your IP was not detected, so you most likely don't have an active network connection."

"Your IP address is external. This is not a good sign. Probably you're in mobile operator's network, which often restricts external access to the devices inside. You can try opening the video stream on any computer with Internet access by opening this address in browser: http://$IP:$PORT/
It's still possible that you can access it via the internet. In this case you're lucky. Otherwise you need to ping your phone via the internet to make sure incoming connections are indeed blocked by provider and ask your provider to give you an external IP (it's often a paid option), or use WiFi."

"This isn't going to work! Your IP, $IP is a local IP because it is in private range $LOCALRANGE. This means you may only connect only with computers in the same network or from another device using the same provider, and only if provider allows it.
The URL, in case if you know what you are doing: http://$IP:$PORT/"

"Are you sure you're on local network? Your IP, $IP is an Internet IP. If you get this message, send an email to me at pas.anddev@gmail.com detailing your network setup, as it is not the common case."

"You can open the video stream on any computer in your network by opening this address in browser: http://$IP:$PORT/
Your IP, $IP is a local IP because your it is in private range $LOCALRANGE. This means you may only connect only with computers in the same network. If you want to expose your phone to the Internet, and your router has an external IP, read your router's documentation on port forwarding."
"Getting HTTPS warning is normal when the host is not accessed using DNS. Using HTTPS still protects from eavesdropper attacks when using insecure networks. It's safe to ignore these warnings."
Including one for impatient Skype users
IP Webcam did not close successfully. Do you want to send a report to the developer? The report ID is:

"Ivideon is a cloud online video surveillance service. It allows you to access your cameras from anywhere using PC, smartphone or a tablet. It can notify you when your cameras get off the grid or register motion. Ivideon lets you connect any camera to the service - in addition to your smartphone, wired PC webcams, IP cameras and Ivideon-powered cloud cameras are supported."
Where do I watch my streams?
" You can either watch it in your personal account at "http://ivideon.com/my" , using Ivideon mobile app or Ivideon Client for Mac and PC. "

"Your video streams are private and are only available via your account. You can also share your camera with friends and family, or open it for public viewing. Sharing options are available at http://ivideon.com/my.
All communications, including the video stream are transmitted using industry-standard strong encryption. "

"Ivideon cannot access IP Webcam local video records. However, by configuring motion or sound detection in IP Webcam, you can enable Ivideon to do the following: • Receive push notifications in Ivideon mobile app • Store motion-triggered video records in the cloud and watch them via Ivideon app and the web interface. (paid option, pricing available at http://www.ivideon.com)
You can configure motion and audio detection from the IP Webcam settings menu. "

"• Watch live and recorded video with sound • Embed your live stream into a website or a blog • Share private access to your camera with family or friends, or publish your stream and share URL via social networks • Receive push and email notification of various events (camera off the grid, motion detection etc) • Place your cameras on the map for easier management "
"Ivideon lets you do the live streaming for up to 2 cameras for free. Additional cameras and advanced options, such as Cloud Video Recording require a paid account upgrade. "
" Any questions and feedback you have regarding Ivideon services you can direct to "support@ivideon.com . Other methods of contacting Ivideon are listed at ivideon.com". "
Ivideon is not supported on this device

" You have successfully logged in to Ivideon. Your device is registered for "$ACCOUNT" .
To watch your live stream, start the broadcast and either open http://ivideon.com/my or use the Ivideon mobile app. "
Test if your device is compatible with Ivideon internet streaming
When streaming, prevent screen timeout. Required for camera streaming on Android 3.0+.
Remove older videos when free space is less than $VAL Mb
How much space should be kept free on the storage? Free space improves storage performance and OS stability.

"Known issues: * Front facing camera gives camera info incorrectly (use resolution between 176x144 and 640x480) * If you are using 3G or 2G connection, note that your provider may be using NAT, preventing you from accessing the application. Ask your provider for external IP or use WiFi network or portable hotspot functionality. * Some versions of ESET NOD32 are cutting MJPEG stream from the phone. Disable \"Web protection\" to work around the issue."
"Leave blank if you don't need security"
You can also toggle LED from within the web interface with the Control Panel accessible from the main page.

" The device in charge of allocating the IPs is your WiFi router. The IP allocation (\"lease\") is given for some time and can change after it's expired. This might make IP Webcam inaccessible by the previous address.
To prevent this from happening, you need to enter router's web interface and allocate your device a static IP. Search for menu items similar to \"DHCP clients\", \"Static leases\" or \"IP/MAC binding\", and add an MAC binding here to the desired or current IP.
MAC address of your phone can be found in " Settings->About Phone->Status->WiFi MAC address .
"In pro version, you can use IP Webcam for generating Tasker and Locale events for advanced event handling. Adding event in Tasker is easy: Click Profiles ⇨ + ⇨ State ⇨ Plugin ⇨ IP Webcam"

"Following IP addresses can be used, given there's a route from the viewing PC to this IP. IP Webcam listens on every IP your device has.
$IPS"
Most phones put processor to sleep mode when screen is off
Which condition should IP Webcam report?
Sensivity: $VAL. Can be configured and tested via web interface.

"Enter sensivity. Higher value means more motion is required for action. Sensivity can be tested and configured from web interface for ease of setting up and testing. Just enable motion sensor in Data logging dialog and enter Data Acquisition page in web interface. Default value: 250"
When motion is not detected anymore, how long IP Webcam should keep recording, waiting for another motion? The value is in seconds.
Record video to internal storage when motion detection is triggered
When motion is not detected anymore, how long IP Webcam should waiting for another motion before reporting it absence to web interface and Tasker? The value is in seconds.
Hardware-accelerated MP4 format is not supported on this device

"IP Webcam encountered a native error:
$ERR
If you continue to encounter this error, please report it to pas.anddev@gmail.com."
"How many frames you want to average? Increasing value proportionally increases blur and decreases noise."
"How much extra intensity is required? Note that noise is also multiplied by this value. Decimal fractions can be used."
This feature is only available in IP Webcam Pro. Do you want to get it now?
Configure automatic camera discovery and management
OpenH264 Video Codec provided by Cisco Systems, Inc.
Allow IP Webcam to run in background or display location in the web interface
Embed date/time and battery info in video
Disable camera or screen when not in use

" Get IP Webcam Pro to unlock the following features: - "Tasker integration" . Automate stuff when motion is detected or when you press buttons in web interface. - "Customizable UI" . Create your own IP Webcam. Display or change camera settings locally, take photos - "Server shortcut" . Start IP Webcam in serving mode right from your home screen. - "No watermark on video recording and no ads" . "
Rate IP Webcam on Google Play
Resolutions starting 1280x720 are sometimes broken on devices running Android 2.x. If your video is \"green\", please select a smaller resolution.

"IP Webcam supports streaming over RTSP and ONVIF. ONVIF discovery should happen automatically on supported clients and devices supporting IP multicast
Following RTSP URLs can be used for h264 streaming (replace ip:port with desired configuration, e.g. $IP):
H264/uLaw over RTSP: rtsp://ip:port/h264_ulaw.sdp
H264/HQ PCM over RTSP: rtsp://ip:port/h264_pcm.sdp
ONVIF Web Service http://ip:port/onvif/device_service"
Install and configure extensions for IP Webcam
"Controls how long sensor data is retained in memory and available for acquisition. Default value: 5 seconds."
Collect data from sensors and view it in web interface
When screen is off, improves webserver performance, uses a bit more CPU.
Only signed scripts are supported on IP Webcam Lite

"To Skype, you will need a microphone, a computer and videochat software. Video emulation is only supported on Windows and Linux. The program emulates an IP Camera, it does not provide any videochat functionality itself. First thing to do is to access the web interface of the application as usual. You will find further instructions under the \"Videochat drivers\" option in web interface."
Start IP Webcam from home screen
"Release camera when inactive. Motion won't be detected when camera is released."
"The server will be stopped now. You can quickly stop IP Webcam by pressing \"Back\" key while the video is running."
If your phone reboots while using IP Webcam, this is likely due to CPU overheating. Try removing back cover or placing the phone somewhere cool instead of using this feature.

"Enter string describing text format: %%x is replaced by date %%X is replaced by time %%q is replaced by battery icon %%Q is replaced by battery percentage %%o is replaced by charging indicator
Read more about date/time formats here: http://goo.gl/MCc6BR"
The URL $URL$ has been copied to clipboard

"Would you like to use a new MKV recording format? It provides better quality than WebM, much smaller file size compared to MOV and superior stability to MP4.
You can always switch between the formats in Video Preferences->Video Recording->Video Format.
An active internet connection is required, 400 kb will be downloaded. Download now?"
Unsigned scripts are disabled in configuration
MOV (HQ, size depends on stream quality)
MP4, unstable on some devices (h.264 + AAC)
(Not support on this device) MP4 (h.264 + AAC)
"This option displays the resulting image with overlay and effects applied, on your screen. Please don't use it when you're not holding the phone -- it uses a lot of battery and CPU power."
Where and how to record footage

"To record videos and save photos, an explicit directory access permission is now required on Android 10+. Please select a directory on your Android device using IP Webcam ⇒ Video Preferences ⇒ Video Recording ⇒ Save videos to..."
Resolution, focus, and other video-related settings
To allow IP Webcam to work in the background, configure Optional permissions in IP Webcam settings.
